name: Maglev Turret Mounts
desc:
Maglev technology significantly reduces the friction generated by the ship's turrets when they rotate, as well as greatly improving the turrets' stability.
-Reduces all weapon recoil by %s, and increases turret turn rate by %s.
-Increases the range of ballistic/energy weapons by %s.

name: Arc Field
desc: Spawns arcs that hit nearby enemy ships and fighters for %s energy damage each.

name: Aerial Assault Package
desc:
A unique combat program that allows fighter pilots to control their craft via a neural link. Despite the limited range forced by the limits of the neural links, the fighters can gain increased maneuverability and speed.
-Fighters' maneuverability and top speed is increased by %s.
-Fighters' operational range is reduced by %s.
-%s decrease in crew losses from fighter destruction.
-Hangar-based d-mods will no longer occur on this ship.

name: High-Density Shield
desc:
A rare prototype shield generator.
- High shield upkeep, but impeccable shield efficiency.
- Converts %s of hard flux generated when shields take damage into soft flux.

name: Privateer Configuration
desc:
A unique combat computer with a built-in Delta-class AI core that exhibits behaviors not unlike a pirate captain. The system is optimized for destroying weaker targets; though this becomes a liability when faced with tougher foes.

-Damage dealt to capital ships is reduced by %s.
-Damage dealt to cruisers is increased by %s.
-Damage dealt to destroyers is increased by %s.
-Damage dealt to frigates is increased by %s.

-Damage dealt to ships with a %s is increased by %s, regardless of whether the %s hullmod is present or not.

name: Beam Mode Conversion
desc: Converts the Cliff System and some other LLI hullmods to Beam Mode. Incompatible with %s and %s.

name: LLI Enhancement Protocol
desc:
Enhances the Cliff System's effects by %s.

Only one LLI Protocol hullmod can be installed.
sModDesc: Also builds in %s, while compensating for %s of the penalty to maximum combat readiness.

name: Raid Support Suite
desc:
This ship has a wide variety of systems installed specifically for supporting raid operations.
- The fleet's ECM rating is improved by %s.
- The fleet's nav rating is improved by %s, increasing the maximum speed of your deployed ships.
- Increases the effective strength of planetary raids by %s, up to the total number of marines in the fleet.
- Refunds a specific amount of ordnance points if two or more of the following hullmods are installed that use ordnance points:
%s
%s
%s

name: Refit Compensation
desc: Refunds a certain amount of ordnance points.
